mapper.select: select c.nombre as nombrecliente, c.documento as documentocliente, c.telefono as telefono, c.direccion as direccion, c.email as email, c.vetado as vetado, ir.id as idrentado , ir.fechainiciorenta as fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta as fechafinrenta, i.id as iditem , i.nombre as itemnombre, i.descripcion as descripcionitem, i.fechalanzamiento as fechalanzamiento , i.tarifaxdia as tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as formatorenta , i.genero as genero , ti.id as tipoid, ti.descripcion as tipodescripcion FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id

select c.nombre as nombrecliente, c.documento as documentocliente, c.telefono as telefono, c.direccion as direccion, c.email as email, c.vetado as vetado, ir.id as idrentado , ir.fechainiciorenta as fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta as fechafinrenta, i.id as iditem , i.nombre as itemnombre, i.descripcion as descripcionitem, i.fechalanzamiento as fechalanzamiento , i.tarifaxdia as tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as formatorenta , i.genero as genero , ti.id as tipoid, ti.descripcion as tipodescripcion FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id WHERE c.documento=#{idcli}
